name: Manleluag Spring Protected Landscape
description: A protected area containing natural hot springs and a diverse forest ecosystem. Perfect for nature lovers and relaxation.

name: Daang Kalikasan
description: A scenic road offering breathtaking views of the mountains and rolling hills. A popular spot for road trips and photography.

name: St. Raymund de Penafort Church
description: A historic church with Spanish colonial architecture. A significant cultural and religious landmark in Mangatarem.

name: Timmanguyob Falls
description: A hidden gem featuring a stunning waterfall and refreshing pools. Requires a bit of a trek but worth the effort.
